resources.string:
Start by viewing the "Enter Names" menu and add all of the of players who will be playing Tic-Tac-Toe.

After entering names, click on a name to set the current player.

Next, navigate back to the home menu where you can access the "Play game" activity. The game always starts as the player's turn and after your first move android will make a move\, etc. You can hit the "Reset" button at anytime to fully restart the game.

Once you are done playing you can navigate back to the main menu where you can find the "Standings" activity which keeps track of all player scores as well as Android's score.
